org.activebpel.rt.bpel.coord
Class AeCoordinationFaultException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          org.activebpel.rt.AeException
              org.activebpel.rt.bpel.coord.AeCoordinationException
                  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.coord.AeCoordinationFaultException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class AeCoordinationFaultException
extends AeCoordinationException

Exception generated by either the coordinator or the particpant due to errors related to the coordination activity. Note: This is an internal implementation tailored to be used with requirement 111 i.e. the coordination error type is a simple string code instead of the wscoord name spaced fault code (which would be sent as part of the SOAP faults). The final implemention should follow the Coordination faults described as per WS-Coordination RFC section 4.

See Also:
